Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v4 (AI Usage)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves AI Builder Credit Consumption information on a daily basis. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, and we recommend that you do so only if you're using AI Builder Models in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.
